channel.title: Playing by yourself
channel.description:
I really don't understand the 127.0.0.1 IP when you start MoparScape. In the FAQ's it says this is for playing by yourself(only you, no one else) yet, it never loads. I really need help on how to play by yourself.
Also, I started a new server (HAM) and don't really know what do to. If someone could please help me with that to please.
Thanks.

item.title: Playing by yourself
item.dc:creator: @Grillz_SlapsYou Grillz_SlapsYou
item.description:
@Grillz_SlapsYou wrote:

Okay, I found my IP but I can’t run my server[br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2006, 04:27:39 PM[/size][hr].

Read full topic

item.title: Playing by yourself
item.dc:creator: @Zirakac Zirakac
item.description:
@Zirakac wrote:

127.0.0.1 Is your localnetwork like its your ip not the internet ip.
To find out your internet ip click on the two flashing computers at the bottom right corner…
Or if you don’t see it open network connections from Control panel to check out what is your ip…
If you have a router it won’t tell you real ip… go to http://www.whatsmyip.org/ it will tell your ip
You can advertise that but people use no-ip to hide their IP.
By The way If you have router and you have Hamachi you don’t need portforwarding,
How ever You do for no-ip and For hamachi you click on create a network [find that out your self]
then make up a Name and password that you will remember it is case Sensetive so copy and paste it
into a note pad file and save it to remember it.
Then advertise your Hamachi ip your network’s password and Network name, Make sure your server is running.
Thank me if i helped.
~Zirak

Read full topic
